scripts.start: rm -rf dev-serve && parcel src/index.html src/about-us.html src/recipes_cards.html src/bulk.html src/pantry.html src/grow_food.html src/bulk-advantage.html src/bulk-essential.html src/bulk-guide.html src/pantry.html --dist-dir dev-serve
scripts.build: rm -rf build && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir build --public-url ./
